issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

exists in 1.6.1 as well. All supported devices, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (03/23/11 09:50 87caf1e...)

1.controls > text field > text field in scroll view
2.rotate to landscape
3.tap into a field to invoke the kayboard
4.with keyboard up, scroll the second text field so the text in it is obscured by the keyboard
5.tap the field

results: field goes flying off screen before coming back. landscape only

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: issues tapping into text with keyboard up and test field partially obscured in landscape

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as we no longer support this version of Kitchen Sink.
